caption.p: Principal components analysis (PCA) of the studied holomycotrphic orchids based on the bioclimatic factors from individuals. Variables with the greatest contributions are presented as vectors ( A). Canonical variates analysis (CVA) of the studied holomycotrophic species along environmental gradient. The relative contributions of bioclimatic factors are shown as vectors. Variables with low discriminating impact are omitted ( B). Diagrams were prepared in PAST 2.14 ( https://folk.uio.no/ohammer/past/).
